import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import productview from './productview.css' import Header from './Header' import Footer from './Footer' import chart from '../chart.jpg' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { baseUrl } from './baseUrl' function ProductView() { useEffect(()=>{getLahangadata(); window.scrollTo(0,0)},[]) const navigate = useNavigate() const list = localStorage.getItem('productdata') const [data, setData] = useState(JSON.parse(list)) const [size, setSize] = useState("XS") const[ sizecolor, setSizecolor] = useState(false) const[ sizecolor1, setSizecolor1] = useState(false) const[ sizecolor2, setSizecolor2] = useState(false) const[ sizecolor3, setSizecolor3] = useState(false) const[ sizecolor4, setSizecolor4] = useState(false) const[showChart, setShowChart] = useState(false) const[ lahangaData, setLahangaData ] = useState([]) const postCartData = () => { const item ={ title:data?.title, brand:data?.brand, quantity:1, thumbnailImage:data?.thumbnailImage, price:data?.price?.value, size:size } axios.post(baseUrl+"cart", item) } const getLahangadata=()=>{ axios.get(baseUrl+"lahanga").then((res)=>setLahangaData(res.data.data)) } return (


setSizecolor(true)&setSizecolor1(false)&setSizecolor2(false)&setSizecolor3(false)&setSizecolor4(false)& setSize("XS")} style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",background:sizecolor?"linear-gradient(45deg,#BE9130, #e4c65b, #BE9130)":null}}>
setSizecolor(false)&setSizecolor1(true)&setSizecolor2(false)&setSizecolor3(false)&setSizecolor4(false)& setSize("S")} style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",background:sizecolor1?"linear-gradient(45deg,#BE9130, #e4c65b, #BE9130)":null}}>
setSizecolor(false)&setSizecolor1(false)&setSizecolor2(true)&setSizecolor3(false)&setSizecolor4(false)& setSize("M")} style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",background:sizecolor2?"linear-gradient(45deg,#BE9130, #e4c65b, #BE9130)":null}}>
setSizecolor(false)&setSizecolor1(false)&setSizecolor2(false)&setSizecolor3(true)&setSizecolor4(false)& setSize("L") } style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",background:sizecolor3?"linear-gradient(45deg,#BE9130, #e4c65b, #BE9130)":null}}>
setSizecolor(false)&setSizecolor1(false)&setSizecolor2(false)&setSizecolor3(false)&setSizecolor4(true)& setSize("XL") } style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",background:sizecolor4?"linear-gradient(45deg,#BE9130, #e4c65b, #BE9130)":null}}>
